channel.title: Great article on how reviews affect small businesses
channel.description:
@ian tweeted this recently - the finder's credit is his:
[**http://jayporter.com/dispatches/how-about-a-nice-game-of-chess/**][1]
This is an article by Jay Porter, a restaurant owner, on the effect that Yelp has on small businesses in general, restaurants in particular.
> "... for these businesses to mature, over the years, into truly > compelling entities, they have do more than just not read their > reviews. They have to ignore the very framework of the review system > itself."
As Ian pointed out in his tweet, there are clear parallels here for those of us who try to make a living in the mobile market.
[1]: http://jayporter.com/dispatches/how-about-a-nice-game-of-chess/
